title: 【如何準備英語面試2】What can you offer us? 你認為自己對本公司會有什麼貢獻？

json.text: what can you offer us I can offer my track record in developing new accounts
penetrating companies at the senior level and managing sales cycles I'm well
versed in the latest technology and have knowledge of the local market and a
strong contact base through my past jobs I have demonstrated my ability to
initiate and foster relationships I'm confident that I offer what you are
